options.content:
This dashboard helps visualize Application Signals information from AWS.
To get started, select the appropriate X-Ray data source, CloudWatch data source, and region in the variables above. You can use the account dropdown to further narrow down the list of services.

Use the hyperlinks in the `List Services` panel to update the board with the Service you are examining, and you can use the links in the collapsed boards below to examine an Operation or Dependency of that service.
